examples:
What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I signed up for a Canva free trial but ended up not using it and wish to cancel and be refunded! Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did not do this subscription, not even a trial so I demand a refund before I take this up with my bank!!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled my pro free trial but was still charged. I do not use the app enough to justify the expense.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello. I accidentally forgot to cancel my free trial and got charged $119 for a year long subscription. I cancelled the subscription right after i found out i was charged and have not been using this website at all. I was wondering if there was any chance i could get my money back? Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am not using the service and was just charged. Please refund charge as I thought I cancelled this before my trial ended

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I was charged for a Canva Pro account, but I thought I cancelled before my free trial was up. Is there any way I can be refunded for the current month?

Thanks for your help!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello Sir/Madam,

We have participated in the Canva free trial it said we will take the money in one month if you don't cancel it, we canceled our account before the one month, but they took the money on the day we accepted the free trial.
I hope you guys refund our money and stay true with your promise.

Kind regards,
<NAME> Akbari

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I started the free trial subscription for Canva Pro and I completely forgot to cancel it. I found it unnecessary to have since I don’t use Canva that often and I just can’t afford it right now. I was wondering if I could get a refund for the charge that just went through.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello I was billed for a Canva pro subscription but it was only just supposed to be the free trial I did not want to sign up please refund my money thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please refund my subscription. I had  cancelled before the trial ran out and I was still charged. 

Thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled my subscription way before the end of trial date but the canva took money from my account

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was just charged for the Canva Pro subscription, but I meant to cancel before my trial ended and forgot to. Please refund. Thank you!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I thought I canceled canva pro subscribtion on the last day of my free trial. You already charged me the day before my free trial ends and i did not get any refund yet. Please advice!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 

I cancelled my free trial but you have still attempted to withdraw money for this.

Please could you advise further?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, 
I was charged for a subscription for free trial. Which I have already cancelled. I ask to kindly check and refund back. As I did not renew anything.  Kindly ask for your help on this issue. Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was no warned about my free trial ending, and ended up paying a huge amount of money that I did not intend to. The system did not warn me and this is completely unacceptable. I want my money back.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I meant to cancel my subscription before the free trial ended and need a refund. I cannot afford to pay for Canva.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi i already cancel the subscription before the free trial ends. But canva still charged me. I want a refund!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled my membership before the free trial ended and it still charged me.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Needed to cancel my trial - today was the last day of my trial and I was about to cancel it but I still got charged. Could you please assist with cancelling and refunding the money back to me?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I signed up for a free account back in March of 2020 and I see I've been charged for the last 10 months despite not using the website after the free trial. I'm requesting a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Charged for my year of canva pro, but was not intending on using - the free trial was necessary for me to figure out if I needed pro, and for my business I do not currently need its services, and am frustrated because I was not informed before being charged and I would like a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I forgot to cancel my free trial, but did so on the same day as billing. I have still not received a refund. Please advise. Many thanks. <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I thought I had cancelled my subscription.  I did not want to purchase it after my free trial expired.  I would like a refund! 

Thank you,
Stacy McCoy
Country Outbound

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I canceled the Canva pro free trial but I was already already charged, can I get a refund

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I forgot to cancel my subscription before my free trial ended. I have been charged and would like a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I'm trying to sign up for the pro but with the free trial. It says you will charge a small amount and then refund back. What is that amount? you should have it on your site!

What did you have a problem with?: Canva Pro

Describe your issue: Hi. I hope you are fantastic. I started a free trial of canva pro and made sure to cancel before the payment was due when my free trial ended but the payment was taken anyway. I'd really love to resolve this quickly and efficiently. How can we do this? Thanks and have a fantastic day! <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did a free trial a couple of months ago and the cancelled it before it was up but it keeps charging me and I have no subscription

What kind of problem?: <NAME>

Beskriv ditt problem: Hi, I was on the free-month try out with canva pro, and I wanted to cancel it before the free period ended because I don´t need canva pro. I did cancel it yesterday and removed my payment details (before the free month ended), but now I see that a payment has occured from my bank anyway. Can I please get back my money since I cancelled my pro subscription within 1 month and I wish to not use it anymore. 

Best regards, 
<NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: hi i cancelled my free trial for canva pro slightly late and i got charged. is it possible for me to get a refund. thank you

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have not been using Canva, and went to cancel my free trial yesterday and got charged for it. I would like that charge to be reimbursed and my plan to be cancelled.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I did the free trial but I concealed it the next day why did they charge me I need my money back

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi,

I would like to cancel the pending payment for the subscription. I forgot to cancel after the free trial and would like a refund, how do i go about this?

Thanks, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I need to get a refund for a charge from you guys. I was under the impression I would have to confirm to keep my account after the trial ended instead of getting charged automatically. Never really used it during the trial and would appreciate a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i never signed up for canva pro, i thought the it was a free trial period and it will expire if i don''t renew it.  Instead your company charged my account !!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Canceling subscription to get refund. I submitted a request days ago to have a refund since I was trying to cancel my trial before getting charged the subscription. Can someone answer this question?

What was the problem you had ?: Canva Pro Describe the problem: I signed up for the free trial, but I canceled the subscription before the deadline and I was charged as if I had signed the package, even during the trial period.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Please return my money to the card where you debited it out. We need that money. Please. And cancel the subscription. I am trying the free trial, and You immediately charged 509.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was billed for the year today (my trial ended today)--but I cancelled and would like a refund.  I thought I had all day to cancel.  Apparently not.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I had originally tried to cancel my free subscription before the trial ended and it kept saying error and still charged my card.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I signed up for a free trial and I was charged today for an annual free . How do I get a refund for what I did not sign up for? thanks

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I forgot to cancel my free pro trial and i was charged for the full year. The trial ends today, Jan 31, 2021 but I was already charged the full year of subscription. Please refund and I will revert back to the free version. I apologize for any inconvenience. Thank you!

Sincerely,
Cathrina

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i only signed up for the free version but was charged $119. Please reverse this fee and cancel my subscription if it is not free. Thank you. <EMAIL>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: HI I was charged for a subscribtion that I never signed up for! I never even signed up for a free trial.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi there,

Not having a problem with Canva Pro, but wanted to inquire about the possibility of extending my free trial. Unfortunately, we jumped the gun on the free trial and haven't been able to put this month to full use, and as we are starting a new business, really want to learn the ins and outs before making a purchase decision. Anything you can do would be greatly appreciated. 

Thanks so much

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I cancelled Canava via the app prior to the end of trial period and was billed anyway

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to get a free trial per month and it said I do not have to pay any amount until trial period ends. However I was charged for it on my card. Please reverse the amount ASAP.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I wanted to cancel my subscription before I was charged. I was expecting a reminder before my trial ended but I did not get one. Is it possible to get a refund?

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I have previously given unsubscribe, after the free trial period and still they have charged me the invoice. I still cannot make this payment so I requested the cancellation ... I appreciate the refund and the cancellation of the subscription.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I used a free trial of Canva and cancelled it before the free trial period ended and I have noticed that I have just been changed a yearly fee! :( This is not something I signed up for or a service that I decided on using while in the trial period. Can someone please assist me. Should I lodge a charge back through my bank or request a refund through Canva?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I just found out that I was charged a fee by Canva, and I forgot to cancel my free trial. Could you please cancel the subscription for me and issue a refund for the charged fee?

Thanks!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I canceled my trial period a couple of weeks ago via the phone app. I think there was an issue because today I was charged. PLease issue a refund, I do not want the service. Thank you very mcuh.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I would like to cancel my subscription with immediate effect. I was on the one month free trial but I do not want to continue anymore.. and I am charged the amount of money..

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I forgot to cancel my subscription. Is there any way to cancel the charge? I did not end up using the pro during my trial and got billed. Is there anyway to cancel this charge? Thank you.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I have cancelled my free trial and still charged for Canva.. I have rent to pay this week. I don't authorize the charge as I cancelled and have screenshots

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged before I was reminded my trial was ending. I want a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I want to cancel my free trial and make sure I will not be billed. I do not wish to pay for the service after this free trial.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to cancel my free subscription, before I am charged to continue my subscription. I'm beginning to wonder if I even had a Canva Pro free trial, because it doesn't take me anywhere to cancel it.  I've looked and looked with no success. I'm totally lost. I need information as to the activity of my account. Thank you.

What kind of problem ?: Describe your other Problem: Hello, I just clicked on the free trial version. When is the free trial ending? I don't want to pay a fee. How will I know when the trial period is over. I cannot continue. Would you help me with this topic? Is money being cut right now?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi I signed up with a free trial and didn't get to use it enough. I thought I canceled it but then noticed there was a charge. Since I saw a charge I decided to try and use it but I got a late start. I was wondering if you could give me one more free month so I can see If I can make this work for me. I have never used a program like this and am trying to see it's benefits. Thank you in advance. Jamie DeLuccio

Describe your issue: I have subscribed for free trial. And then there was a message regarding debit card not supported for payment. I want to cancel the subscription.

Then when I tried to use canva I received an error message stating "something went wrong. Please try again. If the problem persists. please contact support". I would like a refund as I thought I was signing up for a free trial and I wasn't even able to use your services because the error message kept popping up.

Describe your issue: I downgraded my subscription before the free trial period was over, and was still charged.

Could I please request a refund? I could not cancel the subscription before it renewed from the free trial. I cannot afford to pay over £100 for a subscription during Covid. Kind Regards
Lesley Phillips.
